chapter.title: Changing the UI Locale
chapter.para: You can use this procedure to change the UI locale to specify either English or Japanese.

step.para: Navigate to ConfigureMy Settings from the navigation bar.
In the Visual tab, go to Display Settings.
In the Locale list, select the desired UI locale to specifiy either English or Ja for Japanese. The default is English.
You can also change the time zone from the Time Zone list as required. The default is (GMT+00:00)UTC.
